dcterms:creator: F. Fumero
S. Alayón
J. L. Sanchez
J. Sigut
M. Gonzalez-Hernandez
dcterms:description: The RIM-ONE-r2 dataset consists of 455 colored fundus images, with 255 normal and 200 glaucomatous images. The dataset has the optic nerve head (ONH) region already extracted with varying image sizes.
dcterms:title: RIM-ONE-r2

dcterms:creator: J. Sivaswamy
S. R. Krishnadas
G. D. Joshi
M. Jain
A. U. S. Tabish
dcterms:description: DRISHTI-GS is a public dataset consisting of 101 uncropped fundus images annotated by 5 clinicians into normal and glaucoma classes. The images have a Field-of-View of 30º and a resolution of 2896 × 1944 pixels.
dcterms:title: DRISHTI-GS
